alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 10:29AM EDT until June 14 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN WICOMICO AND NORTHEASTERN DORCHESTER COUNTIES... At 1029 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vienna, or 11 miles northwest of Salisbury, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Delmar and Delmar around 1050 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Galestown, Mardela Springs, Brookview, East New Market and Eldorado. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
